structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The commission may employ legal counsel whose compensation shall be paid from water district funds.
law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 174, sec. 2. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938g-18.

metadata.lrc-note: . A technical correction has been made to this section by the Reviser of Statutes under authority of KRS 7.136.
